function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exacerbation of unhealthy food consumption, physical inactivity, and sedentary behavior due to COVID-19 control measures","Impact":"Increased risk of obesity, which is a risk factor for adverse outcomes of COVID-19 infection","Mitigation":"Promoting education on healthy food choices, encouraging physical activity, and providing access to affordable and nutritious food options","Technologies":"Health education apps, online fitness programs, and food delivery services","People":"Populations in LMICs and countries facing food insecurities","Owner":"Public health organizations, local governments, and community leaders"},{"Description":"Threatened food supply and increased food insecurity due to COVID-19-related closures of national borders","Impact":"Risk of inadequate food production, import, storage, and transportation, leading to food shortages and wealth inequality","Mitigation":"Investing in local food production, improving food storage and transportation systems, and implementing food security policies","Technologies":"Food storage technologies, agricultural innovations, and supply chain management systems","People":"Countries dependent on food imports and populations with limited access to fresh foods","Owner":"Government authorities, agricultural organizations, and international aid groups"},{"Description":"Lack of nutritional knowledge, cooking skills, and guidelines for ensuring nutritional quality of food parcels to the poor","Impact":"Increased risk of unhealthy food choices, inadequate nutrition, and heightened food insecurity","Mitigation":"Providing nutritional education, cooking classes, and implementing standards for nutritional quality of food aid","Technologies":"Online nutritional resources, virtual cooking workshops, and food quality monitoring systems","People":"Populations with limited access to nutritious foods, the poor, and food aid recipients","Owner":"Non-profit organizations, community centers, and educational institutions"}]}
